item.title: About
item.description: Hey, I’m Zoé Lück, im currently working on diversifying my skillset as im mainly a linux systems administrator and devops administrator, I’m now breaking into go development to become a “fullstack” backend dev that can not only write but also deploy and administer the backend of your next project
